data.title: Daniel Santi, MD, PhD · School of Pharmacy · UCSF
data.meta_description: Department of Pharmaceutical Chemistry · Since my retirement in 2000, I became CEO of Kosan Biosciences. I returned to UCSF in 2007 where I served as interim Director of the UCSF CTSI and then Director of Translational Research at QB3.
